data.name: Enelia: Dawn of Madness
data.detailed_description:
If you lose someone dear you go the end of the world to find conciliation. Especially if it is someone who shares your dream. The dream to find an answer to the ultimate question: whose this mysterious Voice that vibrates through all the living?

Enelia is a beautifully hand-crafted visual novel about the adventure in an enigmatic world ruled by mythical creatures. You play as a Za’ani - a fantasy race who has special vibro organs, that helps them hear all the living. Choose your path and reach the end of the world.

Key features:

- Explore hand-crafted mysterious world
- Enjoy epic and fascinating landscapes
- Meet dozens of mythical creatures
- Choose your path and reveal multiple endings
- Collect objects and learn the history of the world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+ (x86)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Sound Card: Version 9.0
  • Additional Notes: 1 gb available space
